data.author: iBlogiOS

changelog.release_notes: Version 2.2 features hourly vibrations between 9:00 A.M. until 7:00 P.M. currently until settings configuration is available.  Also, have added the day of the week!
Battery gauge has been added.  12h time and date will no longer have 0 before the number i.e. Nov 03 will now be Nov 3.  09:30 will now be 9:30.
Completely recoded watch face.  Dramatically improved battery life, cleaned up interface, and prepared coding for bluetooth disconnection vibrations and battery gauge.
Fixed a bug preventing time from updating without a refresh.
Third release, Version 1.2, now includes time, date, and weather (Fahrenheit only currently). App settings will be added to included Celsius.
Second release, version 1.1.  Watchface now includes weather in Fahrenheit.
Initial release version 1.0. Currently has time, 12h, and logo.

data.description: A watchface for all Batman fans.  This watchface currently includes the Dark Knight Logo along with time, date, day, weather, top of the hour vibration, and battery gauge.  Future updates will include weather condition icons, bluetooth notifications (to warn you've left phone behind), and app settings to include Celsius.

latest_release.release_notes: Version 2.2 features hourly vibrations between 9:00 A.M. until 7:00 P.M. currently until settings configuration is available.  Also, have added the day of the week!

data.title: BATMAN DARK KNIGHT
